original: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

original: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko nakusalo
analyzed: ▁a saṃkiliṭṭh a asaṃkilesik aṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na a saṃkiliṭṭh a asaṃkilesik o ▁na kusal o

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁ saṃkiliṭṭh asaṃkilesik aṃ ▁akusal aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na saṃkiliṭṭh asaṃkilesik o ▁na akusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁ adhipatiyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi
